text: Giovanni Ruvolo (born 8 May 1966 in Caltanissetta) is an Italian biologist and politician. He ran for Mayor of Caltanissetta as an independent at the 2014 Italian local elections and he was elected on 11 June 2014. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Caltanissetta ==External links== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Caltanissetta
title: Giovanni Ruvolo
